name: Wake Maker
description: Yowzers! Welcome to the 15 knot+ club ya speed demon skipper!

name: Explorer
description: It looks like home is where the helm is. Cheers to 10 days away from home port!

name: Mooring Pro
description: It takes a lot of skill to "thread that floating needle" but seems like you have mastered mooring with 10 nights on buoy!

name: Anchormaster
description: Hook, line and sinker, you have this anchoring thing down! 25 days on the hook for you!

name: Traveler todo
description: Who needs to fly when one can sail! You are an international sailor. √Ä votre sant√©!

name: Stormtrooper
description: Just like the elite defenders of the Empire, here you are, our braving your own hydro-empire in windspeeds above 30kts. Nice work trooper!

name: Club Alaska
description: Home to the bears, glaciers, midnight sun and high adventure. Welcome to the Club Alaska Captain!

name: Tropical Traveler
description: Look at you with your suntan, tropical drink and southern latitude!

name: Aloha Award
description: Ticking off over 2300 NM across the great blue Pacific makes you the rare recipient of the Aloha Award. Well done and Aloha sailor!

name: Navigator Award
description: Woohoo! You made it, Ticking off over 100NM in one go, well done sailor!

name: Captain Award
description: Congratulation, you reach over 1000NM, well done sailor!

name: Helmsman
description:
